mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASE (memberUniqueId, productId, amount, timestamp) VALUES (#{memberUniqueId}, #{productId}, #{amount}, #{timestamp})
mapper.select: SELECT pr.purchaseId purchaseId , p.name productName , p.price price , pr.amount amount , m.id memberId , pr.timestamp timestamp FROM PURCHASE pr INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON m.uniqueId = pr.memberUniqueId INNER JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.productId = pr.productId WHERE pr.productId = #{productId};
